div.p:
OnePageBlogger is a one page template for Blogger. You can use it to create your own personal web page, like this guy or get to work using your HTML & CSS skills and make something interesting. Instructions on how to install it can be found in the README on my GitHub repo for this template.
The best part, there is no compulsion for you to give credits to me or a link to my github profile. I know how much that sucks :p That said, I have added my name and my github profile as a comment in the source code (It won’t be visible to the public), for humanity’s sake, let it be there :)

body.div: for the planet before mars, by @nshntarora
